scripts.test: npm run clean && (npx cucumber-js || true) && node generate-report.js
scripts.test:wp: npm run clean && (npx cucumber-js --tags @wp || true) && node generate-report.js
scripts.test:signup: npm run clean && (npx cucumber-js --tags @signup || true) && node generate-report.js
scripts.test:invalid: npm run clean && (npx cucumber-js --tags @invalid || true) && node generate-report.js
scripts.test:valid: npm run clean && (npx cucumber-js --tags @valid || true) && node generate-report.js
scripts.regression: npm run clean && (npx cucumber-js --tags "@wp or @signup" || true) && node generate-report.js
